attributes.action: football player to have wage cap of £10000 a week
attributes.additional_details: If the football clubs wont act to save football let us as fan make the differents.I want the government help to get a wage cap for players its has become a joke now players earning over £200000 a week!! club are struggling to compete in its leagues because money talks! Clubs struggling to just  survive because player want so much money which puts ticket prices up and people just cant aford them with mean club have debt like tax and its unfair we pay are tax and they don't! You only live once and you have to enjoy it! If we cant aford to go because player wages are so high clubs have to put ticket prices up! Over the past few year football stadiums have emptied, atmosphere are dieing and passion is being lost. club are getting in more and more debt because of greedy players wages which mean clubs are starting to get in trouble as you can see happening already and end up going into administration so the tax man doesn't payed which it unfair on all us tax payers!
